original: 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened Buddha Amitābha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po @160a *//🔽dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po @160a *// dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva endowed with great compassion.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Mahāsthāmaprāpta.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma mi'u thung sha za mo ri khrod lo ma gyon ma dgra sta dang / zhags pa 'dzin ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma mi'u thung sha za mo ri khrod lo ma gyon ma dgra sta dang / zhags pa 'dzin ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, Blessed One, the cannibal dwarf Parṇaśabarī, holding an axe and a noose.

original: 'jigs pa gang dag ci byung ba de dag thams cad dang / yams kyi nad gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed chen po gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang /
analyzed: 'jigs pa gang dag ci byung ba de dag thams cad dang / yams kyi nad gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed chen po gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang /
translated: whatever harms there are,🔽whatever conflicts there are,🔽whatever internal harms there are,🔽whatever arises,

original: 'khrug pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / khong du gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / gang dag ci byung ba de dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'khrug pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / khong du gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / gang dag ci byung ba de dag thams cad ni /

original: byis pa kho na la 'byung gi /
analyzed: byis pa kho na la 'byung gi /

analyzed: mkhas pa la ni ma yin no //

analyzed: bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig dang / bden pa'i ngag gis song zhig /
translated: By the truth, the words of truth, and the speech of truth, go!🔽Depart!

original: dengs shig / mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis bdag dang / sems can thams cad la srung bar mdzod cig /🔽yongs su bskyab par mdzod cig /
analyzed: dengs shig / mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis bdag dang / sems can thams cad la srung bar mdzod cig / yongs su bskyab par mdzod cig /
translated: By these mantra bases blessed by the wise, protect me and all sentient beings!🔽Fully protect!
